title: cafter
author: cafter
content: I don't have much knowledge of coding and languagesmy question is while we type our reply/post, the code of placing hyper link is very  different from html,means what language the forum supports,  to type?or all elements are completely unique or separate, means specifically made for this forum.glad, that i discovered this forum, from silk road documentary on YouTube, Otherwise I would have been scrolling videos on Instagram till now and also, share how you discovered this forum?many people come here saying "i am new to bitcoin, from where can i start"   and share their first bitcoin purchase ,and after some posts i don't know how they get very pro at teaching bitcoin to others. i don't know how they found this forum in very early stage, when i was new to bitcoin i was just watching youtube videos about bitcoin and how to buy and all that question was just clearing out. and no one channel/youtuber on youtube told about bitcoin forum, i randomly watching some interesting stuff on youtube and got eye on silkroad video where there is too many times called name of "bitcoin talk" then i searched on google and i made an account. and now here writing this.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: cafter on April 02, 2023, 09:17:50 AMI don't have much knowledge of coding and languagesmy question is while we type our reply/post, the code of placing hyper link is very  different from html,means what language the forum supports,  to type?or all elements are completely unique or separate, means specifically made for this forum.It is called bbcode, anything users entered to this forum (im referring to post/reply) is in bbcode format. While html and css works behind for us to make this forum a bit user friendly look.Quote from: cafter on April 02, 2023, 09:17:50 AMand also, share how you discovered this forum?From an online acquaintance, and the rest is history. Quote from: cafter on April 02, 2023, 09:17:50 AMi don't know how they found this forum in very early stage, when i was new to bitcoin i was just watching youtube videos about bitcoin and how to buy and all that question was just clearing out.Google is there to help always, it will give you millions of answers depends on your question. If you can't ask the correct question then you wont get the answer or your expected answer. The same on youtube.
